title: 139. What No One Tells You About Having High Standards
itunes:title: What No One Tells You About Having High Standards
description:
It’s time to have a serious talk about our dating standards. We all have that set of criteria that dictates what we’re looking for in a partner. But how often do we examine those standards and ask ourselves why they matter and what they have to do with a meaningful relationship?

The world of dating can be a tricky one, and perhaps some of the standards you’re stuck on are making it even trickier in your world. I want you to feel inspired to reevaluate and redefine the standards you’ve set with a sense of practicality so that you can maximize your effectiveness with your dating efforts. 

I dive deeper into this topic by discussing the following:

  • Clarifying Your Standards 
  • Approaching Your Desires with Practicality 
  • Aligning Yourself to Your Desires 

It may feel triggering to listen to this episode, but it’s SO important for you to really zero in on what’s important and what’s not as you approach your love life.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

 

CONNECT WITH BEATRICE:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/theselflovefix 

Website: http://www.beatricekamau.com 

 

EPISODE RESOURCES:

Don't forget there are just a couple of days left to sign up for Dating with Certainty! Dating with Certainty is my online gala event designed to help you get clear on and stick to your standards so that you can begin dating the types of men you desire: http://beatricekamau.com/datingwithcertainty
